document_data.caption: A map showing Shando Street and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Shando Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Shando Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Shando Street was located in the southern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. Shando Street ran diagonally between [[Tarnath Street]] to the northwest and [[Golden Serpent Street]] to the southeast. It was also intersected by [[Suldown Street]], [[Aveen Street]], and [[the Magecourt]].
